verses.verse: Open <S%H6605><s%> thy <S%H1817>doors<s%>, O <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, that the <S%H784>fire<s%> may <S%H398>devour<s%> thy <S%H730>cedars<s%>.

Wail <S%H3213><s%>, O <S%H1265>fir-tree<s%>, for the <S%H730>cedar<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%>, because the <S%H117>goodly<s%> ones are <S%H7703>destroyed<s%>: <S%H3213>wail<s%>, O ye <S%H437>oaks<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, for the <S%H1208>strong<s%> <S%H3293>forest<s%> is come <S%H3381>down<s%>.

A <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3215>wailing<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>! for their <S%H155>glory<s%> is <S%H7703>destroyed<s%>: a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7581>roaring<s%> of young <S%H3715>lions<s%>! for the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> is laid <S%H7703>waste<s%>.

whose <S%H7069>possessors<s%> <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H816>them<s%>, and hold themselves not guilty; and they that <S%H4376>sell<s%> them <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, for I am <S%H6238>rich<s%>; and their own <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> pity them <S%H2550>not<s%>.

For I will no more <S%H2550>pity<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; <S%H4672>but<s%>, lo, I will deliver the <S%H120>men<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> into his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H4428>king<s%>; and they shall <S%H3807>smite<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and out of their <S%H3027>hand<s%> I will not deliver <S%H5337>them<s%>.

So I <S%H7462>fed<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H2028>slaughter<s%>, <S%H3651>verily<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>. And I <S%H3947>took<s%> unto me <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4731>staves<s%>; the <S%H259>one<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5278>Beauty<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2254>Bands<s%>; and I <S%H7462>fed<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%>.

And I cut <S%H3582>off<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3391>month<s%>; for my <S%H5315>soul<s%> was <S%H7114>weary<s%> of <S%H5315>them<s%>, and their soul also loathed <S%H973>me<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7462>I<s%>, I will not feed <S%H4191>you<s%>: that which dieth, let it <S%H4191>die<s%>; and that which is to be cut <S%H3582>off<s%>, let it be cut <S%H3582>off<s%>; and let them that are <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> every <S%H802>one<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H7468>another<s%>.

And I <S%H3947>took<s%> my <S%H4731>staff<s%> <S%H5278>Beauty<s%>, and cut it <S%H1438>asunder<s%>, that I might <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which I had <S%H3772>made<s%> with all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.

And it was <S%H6565>broken<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>; and thus the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> that gave <S%H8104>heed<s%> unto me <S%H3045>knew<s%> that it was the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5869>them<s%>, If ye think <S%H2896>good<s%>, <S%H3051>give<s%> me my <S%H7939>hire<s%>; and if <S%H2308>not<s%>, forbear. So they <S%H8254>weighed<s%> for my hire <S%H7970>thirty<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7993>me<s%>, Cast it unto the <S%H3335>potter<s%>, the <S%H145>goodly<s%> <S%H3366>price<s%> that I was prized <S%H3365>at<s%> by <S%H3947>them<s%>. And I took the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them unto the <S%H3335>potter<s%>, in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Then I cut <S%H1438>asunder<s%> mine <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H4731>staff<s%>, even <S%H2254>Bands<s%>, that I might <S%H6565>break<s%> the <S%H264>brotherhood<s%> between <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3947>me<s%>, Take unto thee yet again the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of a <S%H196>foolish<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>.

For <S%H6965><s%>, lo, I will raise up a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, who will not <S%H6485>visit<s%> those that are cut <S%H3582>off<s%>, neither will <S%H1245>seek<s%> those that are <S%H5289>scattered<s%>, nor <S%H7495>heal<s%> that which is <S%H7665>broken<s%>, nor <S%H3557>feed<s%> that which is <S%H5324>sound<s%>; but he will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H6561>sheep<s%>, and will tear their <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> in <S%H6561>pieces<s%>.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the <S%H457>worthless<s%> <S%H7473>shepherd<s%> that <S%H5800>leaveth<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%>! the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall be upon his <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and upon his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%>: his <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall be <S%H3001>clean<s%> dried <S%H3001>up<s%>, and his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall be <S%H3543>utterly<s%> <S%H3543>darkened<s%>.
